name: Food And Drink 46 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What bakery brand introduced sliced bread in 1930?
Log Cabin syrup was named in honor of President Lincoln?
Which vegetable was  considered Luther Burbank's first creation, although it was around for years?
Which meat would you find in the Chinese dish Moo Goo Gai Pan?
How much did a pound of Maxwell House coffee cost in 1938?

questions.explanation:
True.

	Yes, it's a fruit (by law). But it's also a vegetable (botanically). So the answer is "true".

questions.text: What supermarket chain gave the world Eight O'Clock coffee?
What coffee's 1947 ads read 'drink and sleep'?
What city does the arrow point to on cartons of Haagen Dazs ice cream?
